actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for State and local determination concerning inclusions in the National Register.

summary.text: Prohibits any site, structure or objects from being included on the National Register of Historic Places unless such inclusion is approved by the State and by each unit of local government in which such site, structure, or object is located.

titles.title: A bill to provide for State and local determination concerning inclusions in the National Register.
